text:
Created attachment 26190
Patch to eliminate potential NPE

The code does this in several places:

if (object != null) {
...
}
object.method()

If the object can be null, then the method call should be in the conditional block. If not, eliminate the check.
creator: sebb@apache.org
markt@apache.org
text: Fixed in trunk, will be in 7.0.5 onwards
